text:
I have a portal running apache 1.3.29, which proxies content to the client.

I'm getting regular drwtsn32.exe errors when I browse content in my portal. 
I'm running tests on both W2k and W2k3 with the same results

Through a terminal services session, i can see that Drwatson keeps popping in 
to the process list (whilst the pages i browse stall), it then disappears 
without any interaction from me, and the stalled page loads fully.

Every so often, I've been getting complete stalls on the portal , and have to 
use the kill command to knock out drWatson. Again, when i kill drWatson this 
way apache comes back to life and server the page.

Not sure if the extract of the DrWatson log file helps?

Any help on this woudl be appreciated,

Thanks,

Mike


*----> State Dump for Thread Id 0x1278 <----*
